metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3878 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Media Projection in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY48T and 6.0 before 2015-10-01 allows attackers to bypass an intended screen-recording warning feature and obtain sensitive screen-snapshot information via a crafted application that references a long application name, aka internal bug 23345192.

notes.Note: sbeattie> long application name pushes warning off screen jdstrand> Ubuntu does not use the screen-recording warning feature

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
